channel.description: Plan your app’s sign-out experience Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 785 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: Delete intro and definitions of IdP Session and Application Session.
